duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan and design internal communications network, including testing and certifying new hardware, configurations, and services.
Implement corporate communications network and information technology standards.
Troubleshoot and resolve complex network issues.
Document internal telecommunications systems and configure telecommunications systems.
Establish and maintain network performance objectives.
Design, install, and maintain headend devices and advanced services platforms.
Coordinate power and facility projects, schedule work activity, and maintain SLAs for weekly SMOP submittals.
Serve as Subject Matter Expert on power and facility projects and enforce compliance with standards.
Use test equipment including digital multimeter, amp clamp, and thermal imager to support infrastructure cutover.
Prepare project plan documentation and maintain facility designs and configurations.
Read and understand facility site and floor plans in CAD or Visio.
Demonstrate proven analytical, problem-solving, and organizational ability.
Maintain documentation of facility designs and configurations.
Use data-driven insights to continuously improve network communication strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Network Communications, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
